title: Unable to install rust HEAD with Homebrew
body:
I've been trying to install Rust with `brew install --HEAD` but it's not working, so I figured I'd report it here. The error appears to be in the configure step (git error about "test-installer-v2").

```
$ brew reinstall rust --HEAD -v
==> Reinstalling rust
rm /usr/local/bin/cargo
rm /usr/local/bin/rust-lldb
rm /usr/local/bin/rustc
```
